mapper.update: UPDATE tb_enterprises SET enterprisepassword = #{enterprisepasswordnew}, updatedate = now() WHERE enterpriseno = #{enterpriseno} and enterprisepassword = #{enterprisepassword}
UPDATE tb_enterprises SET enterpriseimg = #{enterpriseimg}, updatedate = now() WHERE enterpriseno = #{enterpriseno}
mapper.select: SELECT U.userno, U.username, U.userprofileimg, UD.userat, UD.activeat FROM tb_users U LEFT JOIN tb_users_detail UD ON U.userno = UD.userno WHERE UD.enterpriseno = #{enterpriseno} AND UD.userat = #{userat}
